Reviews.Title: “Christmas 2011 Stay”
Reviews.Author: OurTracey
Reviews.Content: read previous reviews little apprehensive staying pleasantly surprised hotel clean staff friendly helpful especially 1130pm 1st night stay christmas eve arrived evening discover toilet blocked 10 minutes move equally spacious clean comfortable beds comfortable whenever extra supplies coffee creamer etc readily supplied breakfast admittedly basic charged extra hotel wellsituated tube station notices building stating currently undergoing renovation christmas evidence workmen definitely stay
